description:
Satou is a high school boy in love with his best friend Hime, an unearthly beauty from another realm. So when she moves back to her home world to get married, Satou doesn’t think twice—he follows her and crashes the wedding. Then, after a kiss from Hime, he suddenly becomes the new groom! But here, Hime is a Ring Princess and her husband is destined to be the Ring King: a hero of immense power.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: ตำนานผู้กล้าแห่งแหวน

tags.name: Travel
tags.description: Centers around character(s) moving between places a significant distance apart.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Demons
tags.description: Prominently features malevolent otherworldly creatures.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Alternate Universe
tags.description: Features multiple alternate universes in the same series.

tags.name: Royal Affairs
tags.description: Features nobility, alliances, arranged marriage, succession disputes, religious orders and other elements of royal politics.

tags.name: Robots
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid machines.

tags.name: Hikikomori
tags.description: Prominently features a character who withdraws from social life, often seeking extreme isolation.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Polyamorous
tags.description: Features a character who is in a consenting relationship with multiple people at one time.

tags.name: Monster Girl
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Nekomimi
tags.description: Humanoid characters with cat-like features such as cat ears and a tail.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Marriage
tags.description: Centers around marriage between two or more characters.

tags.name: Tanned Skin
tags.description: Prominently features characters with tanned skin.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

tags.name: Gyaru
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who has a distinct American-emulated fashion style, such as tanned skin, bleached hair, and excessive makeup. Also known as gal.

tags.name: Ojou-sama
tags.description: Features a wealthy, high-class, oftentimes stuck up and demanding female character.

tags.name: Seinen
tags.description: Target demographic is adult males.

tags.name: Rape
tags.description: Features non-consensual sexual penetration.

クリストル・ノバティ・ノカナティカ

ネフリティス・ロムカ
モーリオン・ノバティ・ノカナティカ

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/klotishue)

A male duo mangaka who debuted officially in 2005.

[Website](http://hitodama.info/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/hitodama1103/)

A Japanese singer, songwriter, radio personality and scriptwriter.

She has released 17 singles and 11 albums since her debut as a 13-year-old in 1994. Several of her songs have been used as anime theme songs. She is often mistaken for a voice actress because she is in the same field of activity as idol-esque voice actresses. When she is working as a screenwriter, she goes by the name Deko Akao, an alias made up from her senior [Satoru Akahori](https://anilist.co/staff/97460/)'s name.

Mother of a son and twin daughters.

[Website](http://www.alialive.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/alia___official) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/alia___official/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/alia20180723/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/AliAofficial/videos)

__Formed:__ 2018 

__Introduction:__
AliA is a Japanese six-piece rock band, who debuted on July, 2018 with their mini album _AliVe_.

__Members:__
- [AYAME](https://anilist.co/staff/326046) – vocalist
- RINA – violinist
- SEIYA – bassist
- [TKT](https://anilist.co/staff/209375/TKT) – keyboardist, lyricist
- [Eren Okamura](https://anilist.co/staff/209376/Eren-Okamura) (岡村エレン), better known as EREN (エレン) – guitarist, lyricist and composer
- BOB – drummer

Houno Satoshi is a Japanese composer and arranger, affiliated with Sound Drive.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/s_hono)

__[Blog (JP)](http://forte-piano.net/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/nijine)__

__Birthplace:__ Osaka Prefecture, Japan
__Residency:__ Tokyo, Japan
__Graduated:__ Nana Prefectural Sakurai Senior High School (2001), Osaka College of Music (2004)

__Introduction:__
Akito Matsuda, also known by his alias Nijine, is a Japanese composer and arranger. He worked freelance as a composer and arranger until his employment with Popholic found place in 2007.

__Biography:__
Akito is mainly known for working under the name Nijine, which he did between 2006 through 2012, where he wrote the soundtracks for a handful of anime while also composing and arranging various anime songs. In 2013, he decided to start using his real name for his work instead. He is also known for working on several eroge soundtracks and vocal songs under the name Tokia (stylized as TOKIA) early on in his career.
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Sizuk_official) | [Bio](https://sizuk.co.jp/artists/shunryu/) Shunryuu is a Japanese composer affiliated with Sizuk Entertainment.
__TKT__ is a Japanese keyboardist, lyricist and member of the band [AliA](https://anilist.co/staff/209374/AliA).

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/eren_okamura) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/eren_okamura/)__

__Eren Okamura__, better known as Eren, is a Romanian and Japanese born guitarist, lyricist, composer and member of the band [AliA](https://anilist.co/staff/209374/AliA).

title.native: 異世界魔王と召喚少女の奴隷魔術
異世界でチート能力を手にした俺は、現実世界をも無双する ～レベルアップは人生を変えた～
八男って、それはないでしょう！
金装のヴェルメイユ～崖っぷち魔術師は最強の厄災と魔法世界を突き進む～
俺だけ入れる隠しダンジョン
解雇された暗黒兵士（30代）のスローなセカンドライフ
真の仲間じゃないと勇者のパーティーを追い出されたので、辺境でスローライフすることにしました
治癒魔法の間違った使い方
不遇職【鑑定士】が実は最強だった～奈落で鍛えた最強の【神眼】で無双する～
日本へようこそエルフさん。
